Question
========

A researcher is interested in the effect of feedback on fathers' comforting of crying babies (two conditions: positive or negative feedback) on fathers' level of self-confidence (self-report based on 30 questions). In doing so, he intends to statistically control for the possible influence of the degree of experience of fatherhood (measured in months) on self-confidence.

What analysis technique should the researcher use? 
Answerlist
----------
* Single linear regression analysis
* Multiple logistic regression analysis
* Two-way analysis of variance ('Two-way ANOVA')
* Covariance analysis (ANCOVA)

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
